plot: Lauras husband is in prison. She lives with mother-in-law and son in countryside. In summer doctor comes from city for vacation. They both slowly fall in love and at the same time he fills fathers place for little boy.
title: Ezera Sonate
plot_es: Lauras husband is in prison. She lives with mother-in-law and son in countryside. In summer doctor comes from city for vacation. They both slowly fall in love and at the same time he fills fathers place for little boy.
